Feb. 8, 1987 D Wigan Contest (Championship Section)
Wigan Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wigan Contest wigan-contest-championship-section
Wigan and Leigh College Prizes - 1st £200 and William Haydock trophy, 2nd £100 and trophy, 3rd £70 and rose bowl. 5 bands competed.
